def_en: You can refer to pleasant, exciting, or attractive things as goodies .

def_cn: （电影、小说或真实生活中的）正面人物，好人
def_en: You can refer to the heroes or the morally good characters in a film or story as the goodies. You can also refer to the goodies in a situation in real life.

def_cn: （尤为儿童用语，表示高兴或赞许）太好喽
def_en: People, especially children, say goody in order to express their pleasure or approval of something.
